content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my front windows at bakers mtn, watching the clouds, looking at the tree colors, two objects that i first thought were airplanes came slowly over the mtn barely above the treetops, as they got closer, i stepped outside, i could see that they were solid white and strangely shaped for airplanes, when they got about 500ft from the ground they flew straight, no sounds at all, a 3rd craft, solid white, came from the east head-on course toward the first two, it was moving so fast i cant tell you it's shape, it flew directly between the other two and up the side of the mtn, the first two did what i researched and found to be an immelman turn maneuver, then pursued the other two again accelerating at an impossible rate making absolutely no sound, i didn't think about reporting it at the time, i just found that there have several sightings in this area and thought that this may help
content.summary: 2 white semi-airplane shaped objects came over baker's mtn, a 3rd streaked between them they  turned and followed, faster than possible

content.detailedDescription:
2/1/12 roseville ca 3:05pm an oval object silver/white in color at a very high altitude was traveling due north at an unbelievable speed and made no engine noises. the object had no wings or tail like a typical aircraft and had no contrail behind it. 
  about five minutes later at around 3:10pm a large military jet about the size and shape of a b-52 traveled a similar flight path as the oval object almost as if it was attempting to follow or chase the object down. the wing outlines on the jet were clearly visible as well as the tail section. the jet also streamed contrails from both wings. the contrails from the jet remained in the sky for at least 10 minutes after it passed. the oval wingless object did not leave any contrails behind it. the oval object was traveling at least 4 to 5 times faster and appeared to be about twice the size of this large jet.
content.summary: Wingless oval object traveling at high speed and high altitude produced no contrails.

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding my tow horses and was watching a plang go over and saw what appeard to be a shooting star and it was heading left to right as i was faceing south south east ,the slpit sec the shooting star was down behind the hill a verry bright redish orange light asended up for where the shooting star like ligth when down behind the hill the light asended fast and as fast as a light gos out as a switch was fliped it was gone and off to my left there was a quick streak of redish orange object headin north north east
content.summary: Shooting star

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog one week night mid-dec 2011 & got to the end of the driveway.  i looked down the street to my right (north east direction) and noticed an odd light in the tops of a group of about 6 pines trees about 1/4 mile away.  they are in the back yards of some houses.  no one else was out on my street.  it was dark and the night was clear, temp about 45 degrees.  the light was small, alternating white and green, and it flited among the tops of the pine trees.  at first i thought it was a plane, then maybe some kids out with a toy, but that wasn't it.  the movements reminded me of a hummingbird or bumblebee.  i couldn't see it distinctly given the distance and i was not wearing my glasses. i watched for about 2-3 minutes trying to figure out what it was.  i had never seen anything like this before and i have lived in this neighborhood for 4 years. after about 3 minutes it took off behind the pine trees, up and away from me, apparently in a pretty steady line until i lost sight of it.  now every night i always glance down to the pine trees hoping to see it again, but no luck so far.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Small, alternating green & white lights with hummingbird-like movement

content.detailedDescription:
Three friends were driving east on hwy 98, when they got to 
airport road they noticed 3 red lights in the south eastern sky
traveling east.  the lights were in a triangle formation.  the 
sighting lasted only 6 seconds.

at the same time a seperate group of friends were at 
98 hwy and gulf shore drive and saw 3 red lights in the south eastern
sky traveling in a triangle formation going due east.

i was not a witness to the sighting.  i was asked to submit this report.
content.summary: Three friends saw 3 red lights in the shape of a triangle heading southeast.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my patrol area at pleasant point for fuel. driving south on u.S. route 1, in the town of pembroke, maine, i looked up into the blue sky and oberved a disc the color of silver light streaking across the sky in a westwardly direction. it traveled as if on a rail, in that its path seemed fixed and unwavering. i described its movement as a skipping motion because it seemed to be pulsing. i believe the pulsing gave the impression of a skipping motion. maybe it was doing both. the speed was unbelievable. ive observed many different types o planes etc, having grown up right next to what used to be called pease air force base, i attended air shows, my father was an aircraft mechanic, as a child i observed a jet fighter glide no more than fifty feet above my home in portsmouth, nh. before it crashed into a neighboring apartment building (check the facts. it happened), and in all my years ive never seen anything so unmistakingly unidentifiable as that ship the color of silver light - streaking across the open blue sky. birds, insects, planes, even men, fly, and none are capable of cutting through the sky like the object i observed. at aire shows the speeds at which jets move can be appreciated due to how short a distance the  observer is allowed to ejoy the show from. yet, even at the air show - when the jets fly some distance away - they appear to be moving at a slower rate. this past september, the object i observed was a good distance away - maybe a mile or more - and still its speed was impossible. you may ask: "if it was going so fast, how did you get such a good look at it?" all i can say is this: when the the human mind observes something entirely new to its senses, it locks onto it, and the entire world seems to slow down as all of the brilliant details stand out like flames and brand themselves into your memory. in the state of maine we are not supposed to have mountain lions. the game wardens service says they do not exist up hear. well the people up this way see them. i saw one run across the street in front of my cruiser, and although it crossed the street a few graceful bounds, my mind locked onto what i was seeing for the very first time and allowed me to record details that might be missed amid a more common event. so, anyway, that is my report. ive seen things before, but always had doubts about what i really saw. i have no doubts about last september.
content.summary: While on patrol i observed a disc shaped object the color of silver light streak across the open, blue, sky.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was at the children's museum in chino california at a birthday party. the party was just ending it was around 4 pm i was talking to my wife's cousin when this bright lite kinda flickered it wasn't high up in the sky cause i barely look up just over the two story building it seem to be a way's away cause it looked small but my wife's cousin was also taking picture's, i don't know what kind of camera he had but it had a five to six inch lens on it so i told him to take some pictures he took a total of six pictures all with in maybe thirty seconds you can see the object moving away and up from us till we finally lost it. he then shows me the pictures on the cameras screen they looked very small till he zoomed in close and wow is all i could say i was very excited about the whole event, i was the only one so i had him send my wife the pictures through facebook my wife emailed them to me the next day, my wife's cousin said he left the option of zooming in on the pictures i sent you zoomed in pictures on file cimg215.Jpg and the originals on file dsc_3579.Jpg... the only reason i seen it is because i'm always looking up and was in the marines for a while till i got hurt in the early nineties so know that wasn't a plane helicopter even though the ontario airport is only five or so miles away that actually made me think about the airspace there's no way it was a civilian aircraft the big airlines fly by just a little higher than object..Send me an email or call me to know i"m not just wasting my time..Cause i have lots more..Thank you
content.summary: Sarted off as a bright white glowing double decked disc then morphed into or released a green sphere with a yellow center.

content.detailedDescription: Was in bedroom on second floor near window with young relative. heard a loud roar or rumble and felt house shake we both looked out window. i assumed it was a jet.  when i looked out i saw a large black or grey triangle like shaped object hovering near small tree in front yard. it stayed what seemed like 15-30 seconds and was gone very quickly in sideways or horizontal direction. i just assumed it was some sort of military aircraft but later looked on line and saw no aircraft that fit its description.  it was similar to b2  in appearance but appeared to be smaller. was slightly afraid while house was shaking but afterwards just thought it was weird. i dont know if i have ever asked my relative if they can remember that day.
content.summary: Hoverd near house about tree level in front yard then shot away quickly diagonally,made loud noise and shook house

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping from 11:15pm- 4pm when i had to use the bathroom. i tried going back to sleep but was restless. i finally fell back to sleep when i had a feeling of being held down. it was around 5:45am which is 15 minutes earlier than i usually wake up during the week. i was trying to wake up but i couldn't, i started kicking slowly and tried opening my eyes. i tried screaming but could not make any noise. after kicking harder i started opening my eyes and noticed that my hand were being help against my chest by a being that was standing on the left of my bed. i kicked on last time and then was able to speak and said get the "f" off of me! it started awkardly running towards my window where it dissappeared. the lights were off but i could tell the the being was short around 4ft tall slender like a child, completely naked with no body hair, and dark grey in color. i did not see and facial features.
content.summary: i did  not actually see a ufo,  but a being

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on my balcony, during the summer clear day some cloud, but warm.
i looked out over my balcony as i always do, and looked down to the right of me up the road. there were two people walking down towards me. i noticed a whirlwind a little further away, across from the park, were what caught my eye were two black dots at first. thinking some one was flying a kite. i watched closer and to my amazement they were not kite's not birds not planes nothing i have ever seen.
they were shaped like what i would discribe as a boomerang shaped object or objects as there were two of them. one was a little smaller and seemed to be looking at some thing. the other was larger in shape and was what looked like leading up into the sky. hovering for the other small ship. as it turned or flipped, as they did, the sunlight reflected off its solid black shape.
they were following what looked like a pattern and kept raising up hovering as they ascended up up up the smaller one following slowly behind.
i watched this for about 15mins they just disappeared up out of view into the  sky i could no longer see them.
content.summary: Shaped like a boomerang. 3 lights under wings, black solid, turned light reflected.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside sitting at my picnic table late that evening. when i noticed a strange black cloud about 50 foot in diameter and shaped like a sphere came up over a low ridge line about half a mile away. this cloud was traveling south and following 5 very large black birds that never moved their wings..Just glided along. the birds had a wing span of about 16 feet and slender long bodies for their size.    
at first i thought the small black cloud was a puff of smoke coming from the strip mine after blasting the hill side or smoke from a large piece of heavy equipment up on a higher ridge behind the lower ridge. 
the black cloud seemed to drift along and dropped down lower after clearing the top of the smaller ridge. 
this black cloud was about 60 feet above the black birds trailing behind them and was following their direction toward me on a downward path until i lost sight of them and the cloud against the dark background of the ridge. 30 seconds went by until the black cloud reappeared closer to us. i told my wife to grab the camera to take pictures of this strange cloud while i watched were it is going. i never saw the 5 strange black birds after i lost sight of them, just only the black cloud.
my wife got the camera and as soon as she took the picture the flash of the camera caused the black cloud to immediately changed direction and sped off at an incredible speed. my wife took a second picture as fast as she could but did not get the black cloud in the second one. once we looked at the pictures on the digital camera we were shocked that exactly where the black cloud should have been was this strange craft with another even larger craft higher up that was traveling in the same direction that was not visible to us. in the pictures i estimated that the craft was 12 feet in diameter at it's base and 16 feet high 3 sided bell shaped craft with a dome shape bottom.
content.summary: Small black cloud following 5 odd black birds.

content.detailedDescription: About 9 pm tonight (1-31-12) my husband and i went outside or a cigarette. i always watch the sky on clear nights. i noticed this brighter than normal star around the tree line, and as i'm looking at it, i was thinking, ok, that's not an airplane becuase there were about 3 of them in the sky. it was a yellowish-white ball of fire.  ive seen it up in the sky before, but nothing ever happened before. but tonite was when the thing started to move and i moved to watch it through the trees. i thought, ok, this could be a satalite, but then as it moved, it started to move faster and then it disappeared, i moved all over to see if i could see it again through the trees, but it was gone.  i know that satelites don't just disapear. i know that it wasn't an airplane and i know it wasn't a "shooting star", i know what they all looked like.  i may be starting to second guess myself as this was the first time ive ever seen this.
content.summary: Starlike object moved then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I had just pulled up in my car at the noosa river mouth carpark , 8-05am ,when a sea eagle/kite landed in pandanus palm directly in front of me , thought yea wow cool and grabbed my camera , 4 megapixels sorry, and proceeded to take a series of 6 photo`s of the creature , quite unusual that one should land in this area as they are sorta shy and avoid humans and this is a very busy place and had never seen one here before in 30 years of going there . i did not notice any planes or lights in the sky when i took the photo`s , but when i got home and copied photo`s to my computer i noticed on the third photo of the six i took , 2 lights in the background , i swear they weren't there when i took the photo`s and would surely have noticed them as i am always looking for oddities in the sky , having seen "oddities" on several occasions , the objects only appear on the one photo , the photo`s were taken only seconds apart and they should have been on at least one of the other photo`s , got me stuffed
content.summary: Invisible objects , appeared on digital camera photo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from school listening to the radio when i noticed an unusually bright and slow, low flying object coming toward my direction with a rough altitude approx. 500 ft agl.  the closer the object got to my car, i noticed a disruption in my radio station in an area with no past radio interference occurring.  i pulled over to see it for as long as possible.  when i exited my vehicle i noticed that the object has no sounds reverberating from it.  the path of the object laid just nw of a prominent airspace traffic area of which i witnessed a commercial airliner flying in during the observation.  after watching the object for several minutes, it slowly disappeared behind trees going toward (what i saw) was beale afb.
content.summary: solid, bright pale lights.  no blinks, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were traveling home from church that night.  it was new years day night and also sunday so we had church.  as i was traveling south from tyler, tx towards frankston, tx, i noticed a weird light in the sky.  it was a different color than the planets and stars that we are used to seeing and that is what caught my attention about this light.  the stars and planets are all bright white colored and this was a distinct orange-yellow color.  however, at first i thought that maybe it was the north star because of the location of it, it seemed to be closer to the ground and very, very bright.  we made a right turn to go home and saw the object again from a different angle and it seemed to not be as bright as before and more yellow-orange than it was before too.  the object was so intriguing and fascinating to me that i felt compelled to check it out more so i dropped my mom off at home and then took my camera to the marina to get a better look at it.  when i got to the marina the object had moved over accross the lake and was hovering over the other side of the shore.  there were alot of people out shooting fireworks so occasionally i would hear and see fireworks accross the lake underneath where the object was hovering.  it looked like a orange yellow ball that was pulsating or blinking colors kinda like disco lights flash.  i would see red and blue colors flash inside of this orange yellow ball.  i got out my camera right when i got there and took some still pictures and then decided to do a video.  it was very cold and my hands were shaking so i am afraid the video may not have come out that well, but it does show the object when i used the zoom on my camera to show more detail of the object and then i would zoom out to show where the object was in relation of the lake and the lights on the lake.  the part of the video where you dont see anything but black is when i was trying to get a plane to show up on the video but all the planes i saw were so small compared to this orb that i couldnt get them to show up.  the purpose of that was to show the difference between this orb and a plane.  i stayed for a while and the object just slowly moved away from where i was until it was just a little spec of light hoving over the horizon.  my battery kept going dead so i didnt get to film it all.  i felt excited that i got the object on video.  i really think it was not a plane because planes are not round, and it moved too funny to be a planet or a star. weird.
p.S. i have tried repeatedly to send my videos but i guess the video files are too big and they wont allow me to submit my report.  i will send stills instead.
content.summary: Orange-yellow round orb w/pulsating red/blue/green lights like a disco lights/hovering & slowly moving away 1-1-12 pm

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8pm or a few minutes after, a friend, my two children and i were returning to our home.  while we were in front of the cited address, i was pointing out the stars in the belt of orion to my children when we noticed a "flock" of glowing birds in a perfect "v" moving across the sky at a very fast speed - at least twice as fast as i've ever seen birds move across the sky.  at no time did any of the "birds" flap or change position relative to the other.  though i didn't count them at the time, i recall 5-6 "birds" down each "wing" of the "v" with one in the lead (giving a total of 11-13). the "birds" appeared to be of uniform size and exhibited a uniform dull white-yellow glow.

the "v" came almost directly overhead (approximately 80-85 deg. above the horizon) with a heading of approximately 350 deg in a straight line (as estimated using google earth).  no sound was detected.

initially, i believed the object was a flock of birds due to the distinct "v" shape; however, i noted it was moving too fast to be birds so i began to think it might be a plane based on our proximity to dulles airport.  about this time, i was able to see the "bird" shapes more clearly and again thought it must be a flock.  as the birds/object came over, i waited to hear a sound, however, no sound was heard by any of us.  i lost sight of the object in nearby trees.  i hoped i would be able to make out a shape behind the "birds" from the half moon, but i was not able to do so.  i am not sure if it was a "trick of the trees" but the object may have begun to bank to the right just after it passed us.

a pure guess as to the altitude of the object would be approximately 1000 feet agl.
 
a number of commercial aircraft were in the area; however, they appear much higher in altitude and exhibit standard navigational and anti-collision lights.  dulles airport is approximately 8nm wnw of our location.
 
in an attempt to rule out a flock of birds flying very fast due to a tail wind, i checked local weather and  winds aloft at dulles.  they were:

surface winds 200 deg at 8 knots 
and winds aloft were-

	kiad
fl390	270 / 55 kts	    -66���c
fl340	290 / 42 kts	    -55���c
fl300	290 / 34 kts	    -45���c
fl240	290 / 29 kts	    -31���c
fl180	280 / 39 kts	    -21���c
12,000	280 / 31 kts	    -7���c
9,000	280 / 46 kts	    -2���c
6,000	270 / 48 kts	    5���c
3,000	250 / 31 kts
 
weather was clear and visibility was 10 sm.
content.summary: Glowing flock of birds moving very fast

content.detailedDescription: A year back me and my daughter were dropping my mother off at her elderly home. there is a round driveway and we dropped off my mother and as we were rounding the driveway we saw something overhead and stopped. an extremely large, low flying aircraft flew over the top of the adjacent building and then took a sudden turn and took off so quickly it disappeared in just a second. the shape of the aircraft was triangular with one of the points appearing to be the front. as it was very dark outside, it was hard to make out the color of the aircraft, but we did observe that it had a light on each corner. it was flying extremely low to the ground (right above the treetops) and from what i remember, made absolutely no noise. it was also extremely large, and although it is hard to estimate the size, it was definitely larger than our car. afterwards we both looked at each other in absolute shock and tried to figure out what we saw. we both concluded any other aircraft that we are familiar with would make some noise, and wouldn���t be flying so low. we couldn���t find a plausible explanation for the sighting.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A large dark triangular shaped aircraft with lights on each corner. flew very low to ground and then took off so quickly it nearly dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: We were on a porch when we saw a bizarre light beam in the sky. it was too dark to see what was actually causing the trail, but it was far too wide to be from an airplane or other common aircraft. it was very straight and orange-ish with blue undertones. it "ate itself up" rather quickly, but we got to see it for almost a minute. i felt excited to see it because i am a firm believer in extraterrestrial visitors, but i had never seen anything with my own eyes.
content.summary: Trail of very strange light

content.detailedDescription:
i have never contacted mufon in the past. i had heard of your organization through a national geographic sponsored event. i believe 99% of all sighting are either mis-identification, military secret technology or ?

        with that statement in  mind, im an applications engineer by profession. i call-on military bases including edwards afb, 29 palms marine base, ft. irwin and naws china lake in ridgecrest. while returning home from the trona area after visiting searles valley minerals, i took the cut-off which is the trona road. an isolated 22 mile cut-off back to highway 395 to red mountain.

        on this stretch of road at or about the cross street of randsburg wash (military road), i witnessed a jet, possibly an f16 circling at tremendous speeds. quite frankly, i didnt know our aircraft had the capability to turn in such a way. propulsion on a straight-away i have seen many times & turns as well, but not such tight turns at the speed it was traveling. it was also creating the tight circle smoke plumes that was being generating. myself and 2 other automobiles stopped as well - as i was having electrical "flashing" on my dashboard electronics & pulled over(this is a brand new truck). the view was such a unique site. several sonic booms were heard during this flight process in a very tight circle.

        i started to take pictures of the circular patterns as they criss-crossed in a spiral upward motion from about 12k ft to almost 30k feet in approximation. the jet paused mid-air, and dropped to the lower altitude similar to a harrier jet & began the spiral once again. this time, their were glowing circular objects going straight up in the middle of the plumes. they werent weather balloons, in the traditional sense, as they  would stop mid-air, descend and then accelerate at a high rate of speed upward & then stop as the jet came closer.

        this happened over the china lake "echo" range which is a communications and radar jamming system. the coordinates seemed to be somewhere above the area of 35 degrees 33 08.32" x 117 degrees, 26 38.77" in approximation.

        i was able to capture photos of the circling jet, plumes of smoke and upon initial review, couldnt pick up the circular objects, which seemed to fade-in and out with an almost reflective mirror quality. i thought initially it could be weather balloons made of a highly reflective mylar, as most balloons are produced this way. balloons do have the capability to travel by radio control, so i am not so naive to think and understand that side-to-side and up-n-down movement would not be possible with our current technology. the speeds however & dead stopping in mid-air at a rate that the jet could not match left me thinking it might be something else.

        upon careful review and clicking on the depth of field clarification on my htc cell phone picture i was able to see very clearly the 7 each circular objects. these objects were witnessed by other vehicles that had stopped, they too were taking pictures with their cell phones. the day was clear, the temp about 83f, mid-day at about 11:20am. i have a mountain view in the background of the pictures as a contrast.

        the circular objects went up and down a few more times, stopped at a certain elevation (approximately 12k ft) and ascended straight-up & excellerated to a point of vanishing. the miliatry jet, seemed to attempt to follow, then travelled in a excellerated speed at almost a verticle climb. the aircraft dissapeared from view into the stratosphere.
content.summary: Ufos ascended to a hieght of approximately 35k ft., decended beyond the mountains which are only at about 3k ft circled by jet @ high rate of speed - sky was clear, temp at about 82f .

content.detailedDescription: I was listening to music until about 5am, on tuesday morning, january,31st. i was going to bed a little after 5am when i heard a loud buzz coming from behind my house. i looked out of my bedroom window(facing east)to see what was making that strange buzzing sound, when i saw a flat, slow moving object, with reddish strobing lights traveling in a straight path(north to south)a few hundred feet behind neighborhood trees. at first i thought it might be a conventional aircraft because i live near jfk, but quickly realized it was not anything id ever seen before. i observed the silvery, gun metal colored object for about 15 seconds when it suddenly disappeared (blinked off). i immediately felt a headache coming on. i went to bed and a few seconds later i heard the buzzing sound again. i went to the window a second time, and observed the same object, but this time it was further to the south, and had ceased making the buzzing sound. it slowly drifted out of my field of vision and i went back to bed. i awakened at about 12:30 with a headache.
content.summary: Early tuesday morning, at dawn, i saw an object with strobing reddish lights drift slowly behind some trees around woodhaven blvd. it gave me a headache.

content.detailedDescription:
We were taking star photography pictures at argyle lake state park, north of colchester il.  

we first noticed the object as it was very bright orange traveling across the sky, not in any way related to an airplane or meteor or satellite.  

we had no real explanation when we first saw it.  there was an airplane travelling roughly parallel to the object heading ene.  when looking at the pictures back at home, we realized there was a second object on the other side of the airplane.  our explanation as of now is maybe f16s escorting an airplane?  orange could describe the afterburner.  however there was no sound what soever which makes it not likely.  we also thought maybe low orbit satellite, but 2 identical in the same path roughly makes that unlikely. 

the objects were moving in a straight line at a constant speed, rather fast.  it overtook the speed of the airplane and kept going ene.

i am not a believer in conspiracies, ufos, etc. and i am always debating them.  harrp, chemstrails, all of that is bs and bogus.  then this happened, and i hate this feeling of not being able to explain it.  i'm trying to find some explanation and i don't have one.  i was awestruck, and just didn't know what to say really.  i'm happy i was able to take pictures of it.

the object just kept going on its' path and lost it as it passed over the horizon.
content.summary: A  pair of very bright orange light traveling at a constant speed in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
We were leaving beatrice going north out of town on our way to walmart when my son pointed out the front window a little to the left and said "mom what is that".  at first i thought it was the gas yard towers just to the north, as it wasn't moving and the lights seem to be the same size. as we pulled into the parking lot, the object began to move north and seemed to get a little higher. i didn't know what it was. we couldn't see an object, just lights that were blinking on and of an they seemed to be going around in some sort of big circular pattern. we heard no noise at all and we were both out of the car looking at it. 

the lights reminded me of those fireworks that crackle on the way down. the lights were comeing off and on rapidly, almost sparkling. we decided to follow it down hwy 77. it was on the east side of the highway and seemed to be gaining speed. i couldn't keep up with it. before i realized it i was driving 80 miles an hour and had gone almost 8 miles. i came back to my senses and decided to turn around and go back home. it was picking up a lot of speed and as we were waiting to make a u-turn back, it crossed over the highway and went west. we watched it until the lights were too faint to see. it was moving extremely fast and fairly low to the ground. not as high as a jet airplane. my son tried to film it on his small camera phone several times but the lights didn't show up when we played it back. it really bothered me. on the first video, the lights were bright, and he was pointing right at it. i don't understand how it could have not shown up on the play back. the first thing i said to my son was "no body is ever going to believe us". 

we were both pretty shaken up over it. when we got home, i immediately got online and ordered a replacement charger for my video camera and have decided to keep it in my car from now on. i know someone else had to have seen this! it was too obvious. i wish i could find someone who has so we don't feel so crazy.
content.summary: Pulsating lights in the sky over southeast nebraska

content.detailedDescription:
We were taking star photography pictures at argyle lake state park, north of colchester il.  

we first noticed the object as it was very bright orange traveling across the sky, not in any way related to an airplane or meteor or satellite.  

we had no real explanation when we first saw it.  there was an airplane travelling roughly parallel to the object heading ene.  when looking at the pictures back at home, we realized there was a second object on the other side of the airplane.  our explanation as of now is maybe f16s escorting an airplane?  orange could describe the afterburner.  however there was no sound what soever which makes it not likely.  we also thought maybe low orbit satellite, but 2 identical in the same path roughly makes that unlikely. 

the objects were moving in a straight line at a constant speed, rather fast.  it overtook the speed of the airplane and kept going ene.

i am not a believer in conspiracies, ufos, etc. and i am always debating them.  harrp, chemstrails, all of that is bs and bogus.  then this happened, and i hate this feeling of not being able to explain it.  i'm trying to find some explanation and i don't have one.  i was awestruck, and just didn't know what to say really.  i'm happy i was able to take pictures of it.

the object just kept going on its' path and lost it as it passed over the horizon.
content.summary: A  pair of very bright orange light traveling at a constant speed in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: I live outside of town so have a pretty good view of the skies apart form one security light in a business way down the road. i was letting my dog out to pee on a clear starry night and was looking up at the constellations from my back door as my dog was doing its business. when a moving object caught my eye. it was very high up and looked to me like a satellite moving across the sky from north to south. i kept watching it as i have done so since i was a kid. it seemed to fade and a bit on its straight course and i was tracking where i thought it would be again and it appeared. i had stepped out into the garden at this stage to get a clearer look. it faded maybe twice and was at around 15 degrees away from directly overhead when it just lit up all of a sudden. it was like someone had switched on a flood light. i thought this very very strange as i have watched satellites over the years and never seen them change in intensity. this got really bright for a split second or two, becoming the brightest star in the sky. i thought that maybe a satellite had burned up in the atmosphere, but in a split second it went back to the original duller tone of what looked like a satellite. it kinda freaked me out because the light gave me the feeling of being caught seeing something you shouldn't have. strange but true. it continued on the same path and then faded out of view.
content.summary: Saw light in sky which i thought was satelitte until it lit up

content.detailedDescription: It was just like 2 second when i was taking pictures of the dark of the night and then i see a light that was there and see then the ovni in the picture
content.summary: It was just a second in the time that i take the picture

content.detailedDescription:
Name of photo: 'rods' in chesapeake, va
location: chesapeake, va 
date of incident: 1/27/12, 6:44 pm

description of incident:
 
 on january 27, 2012 at 6:44 pm i was taking pictures at random of a 'waxing crescent moon' as i was trying to decide what type of photo compostion i might use. the following pictures were taken as basic preliminary snap shots before focusing on closeup photos of the moon on a very clear evening.
 the two pictures submitted were taken within 2 seconds of each other.  it wasn't until later that evening, when i was looking at the pictures, did i notice that i may have captured two 'rods' in picture dsc_8019e.  i was convinced when i discovered that in the previous picture dsc_8018e had no evidence of any 'rods' what so ever.  it was as if they were there one second and gone in the next.
 
 identifying the two 'rods': in picture dsc_8019e: 'rod' 1 is located almost in the center of the picture; three branches up from the fork of the tree. 'rod' 2 is much more prominent because it is in the open sky to the right of 'rod' 1. both 'rods' appear to be on the same projectory from the left to the right of the picture. 
 
equipment used: nikon d5000 (70 mm - 1/25 sec. -  iso 250 - f/4.5 - shutter priority)  
 
 
 
 
 
tony surace
content.summary: Taking pictures of sunset.. later began taking moon shots. appears i caught two 'rods' in a photo.  have additional close-up pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Wile sitting in defined backyard in a place called onset beach the stars were bright so i asked everyone there did they know there stars so i decided to give tour starting with big dipped oil dipped northstar. in cubscouts i ran the planatarium. so started the tour when someone trying to be funny says what's that star over there blinking beuitiful colors sitting still in the sky. so i says being funny at the time replied spaceship oh no mothership to be exact so e e eryone laughed it off but i knew exsactly what it was. i stopped the tour quickly rapped up the yard event and headed home i knew on e i got home it would disappear but when i got home i sat in the house for about15 minutes before asking my girlfriend to come outside. i told her i was going to show her something and for her.To tell me what was in the sky. well its night time and ofcourse she's half blind , cool now noone will ever beleive mey girlfriend is half blind ,she says let me go in the house and get glasses. that's when it dealt got had. when she returned she looked in the sky i couldn't and a shiney object appeared speeding almost light speed flew maybe a mile above us came almost right over our head speeding leaving a long streak of light behindy girlfreind took off , ran back into the house and it took me 45 minutes to find her shivering under the couch i told her that it was ok and we wouldn't go back out. i always heared u.F.O stories but never thought i would exsperience anything such as this . as she fell asleep saying that our tv was picking up strange channels that we never gotten before i knew we were being invaded but i have a i'm from missouri aditude you got to show me for me to believe trust me i'm no esotel by far. i stayed up and watched them allnight just flying around capecod ma. the next day i built enough courage to call the meteare news papers to let them know we are intact being visited .I told the paper to watch the sky and i told him to film because i was told by him that cameras need special night lords to record so told him i know you have one to record. the night came and it was worse than the first night .I also had half the neighborhood out watching with me. we desired to post on the roof of my house.Well it turned i
to more of a party gusn. a sighting until early that evening before anyone got to open a bearcan one flew exsacty rite over us and that's when i seen it actually for the first time . it was triangle shape about the size of five school bussess and it skipped through the sky it was flipping left to right wile skipping that continued through the night leaving everyone witnessing in who k and scared then through the clouds way above i saw the biggest craft i ever sees in my life exstend from one cloud to the next and i was so happy now i had witnessess and i knew my news paper guy got that footage , it was an eve
t that wouldn't go unnoticed at a bail concert .I
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: On a september night wile in a defined backyard.. the stars were bright so i decided to give everyone a tour of the stars. seeing i use to give cubscouts tour of stars in planatarium a couple people who witnessed with. me one asked what was the star that.

content.detailedDescription: I was working in the back yard installing wall motions lights at my residence shortly after dusk.  as i glanced up to the sky, i had noticed  a square box as large as a suv.On each corner it had a bright light shinning straight down and a red light in the center was flashing.It was moving in a straight line.It was moving too fast to be a blimp and too slow to be an airplane.  i heard no noise coming from it.  i ran across my backyard keeping my eye focused on it as it continued to move east until i lost sight of it. after it was out from my sight, i tried to reason as to what it was that i had just seen, but logically i could not decipher what it could have been.  but i am certain i know what it was not.Even though i believe of the possiblity of ufo's i was too embaraced to share my experience with co-workers.
content.summary: Square craft lights on each corner red light in center

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch with friends and family and happened to glance up through the trees branches. i saw a multicolored belt of lights flashing sequentially from one side to the other and then back again. it hovered in place. at the same time, i saw the lights of a plane pass across my field of vision in front of the hovering object, so i knew it was definitely not a plane. the object, still hovering in the space place, began to slowly fade. it did not decrease in size as if it were moving away, but rather faded into black.
content.summary: Saw hovering object with sequentially flashing lights around belt

content.detailedDescription: My son and i walked out of our house around 6:03pm, so i could smoke a cigarette.  i pointed to him up in the sky all the planes that i saw, because i thought there were a bunch flying in the same area.  then i looked straight ahead, over a house across the street from us.  i stared at a huge bright ball of light, and noticed it wasn't moving.  so i pointed it out to my son.  we walked closer in the direction of the light.  we stood outside and looked at the light for approx. 10min.  for the first 5min, the bright light was blinking very fast and wasn't moving in the sky at all.  it was also very close to the ground.  then after the 5min, the bright light started to slowly move sideways across the sky and at the same time the light dimmed.  then after moving alittle ways across the sky slowly and not going up/down in the sky, it moved super fast across the sky.  also the light pattern changed. while it was moving fast, we noticed green, red & yellowish/white blinking lights.  around 6:10pm is when we could no longer see the light object b/c it was behind trees.  we stood outside for another 5min and saw nothing.
content.summary: Saw big bright circle light over house
